question: What is the India’s rank in the 2019 Index of Cancer Preparedness (ICP)?
explanation: The Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU) has released the 2019 Index of Cancer Preparedness (ICP) in which India\'s overall rank is 19th out of 28 countries, with a score of 64.9. Australia topped the index, followed by the Netherlands and Germany. The ICP explores the issue of cancer preparedness through three broad domains: Policy and planning; Care delivery; and Health systems and governance.  It was released as part of the report titled “Cancer preparedness around the world: National readiness for a global epidemic” prepared by EIU.
